description:
We get a look at the way the people around her view Ekoda, as pictured by Kojima Masayuki (Made in Abyss, Monster) and voiced by Ise Mariya (Hunter x Hunter, Hanebado).
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rinshi!! Ekoda-chan: Kantoku to Ekoda-chan Ra no Zadankai - Kojima Masayuki x Ise Mariya
Rinshi!! Ekoda-chan: The Director and Ekoda-chan`s Naked Chat 8 - Kojima Masayuki x Ise Mariya
臨死!! 江古田ちゃん 監督と江古田ちゃん裸[ら]の座談会 小島正幸 x 伊瀬茉莉也
